name: Tamerlane
what_did:
Tamerlane led powerful armies across Asia, the Middle East, and parts of Europe.
He built a huge empire with his capital in Samarkand.
Though feared for his battles, he also supported art and learning.
why_matters:
Tamerlane changed the shape of many nations with his conquests.
He left behind beautiful buildings and a legacy of both fear and wonder.
His empire showed how one person could impact many cultures.

options: Led armies and built an empire

fun_fact: Tamerlane's tomb has a warning on it: 'Whoever opens this will unleash a conqueror worse than me!'
